name: Madness Chambers
description:
Madness Chambers is an incredibly addictive and action packed physics platform shooter

Visually Inspired by the Madness Combat series the game is hand drawn with a black, white and red color scheme with the red being for the blood and guts! - ofcourse.

With 20 increasingly hard levels, make your way though death chambers with a variety of weapons and enemies to deal with as well as obsticals that will kill you.
